pages.index: CricketX - Experience the Ultimate in Mobile Cricket Gaming at Home CricketX Home Features of the game Game modes Our obligations Join Be ready Experience the Thrill of Cricket Anywhere, Anytime Welcome to CricketX, the ultimate mobile cricket game designed to bring the excitement and passion of cricket right to your fingertips. Dive into realistic gameplay, compete with players worldwide, and become the cricket champion you've always dreamed of. Down-load a game Game Features Why CricketX Stands Out CricketX offers a unique and immersive cricket gaming experience with features that set it apart from the rest. Whether you're a casual player or a cricket fanatic, CricketX has something for everyone. Realistic Gameplay Enjoy lifelike graphics and authentic cricket mechanics that make every match feel like a real game. Global Competitions Compete in tournaments against players from around the world and climb the leaderboards to become a global champion. Endless Entertainment Game Modes and More CricketX offers a variety of game modes and features to keep you entertained for hours on end. Explore everything from quick matches to extensive career modes. Quick Matches: Play a quick game on the go. Career Mode: Build your career from rookie to legend. Multiplayer: Challenge friends and foes in real-time. Tournaments: Participate in worldwide tournaments. Customization: Personalize your team and players. Challenges: Complete daily and weekly challenges. Achievements: Unlock achievements and earn rewards. Updates: Regular updates with new features and improvements. pages.privacy-policy: CricketX - Comprehensive Privacy Policy and Data Protection Information CricketX Home Features of the game Game modes Our obligations Join Be ready Privacy Policy SENSITIVE INFORMATION We do not collect sensitive data such as biometric data, racial or ethnic origin, political opinions, religious or philosophical beliefs, trade union membership, genetic data, health data, data concerning a person's sex life, or sexual orientation. We ask that you do not send us, and you do not disclose, any sensitive personal data on or through the mobile application or otherwise. YOUR CHOICES AND RIGHTS You have several choices regarding the use and disclosure of your personal data. These include: Marketing Communications: If you decide at any time that you no longer wish to receive marketing communications from us, please follow the unsubscribe instructions provided in any of the communications or update your user preferences information. Cookies and Similar Technologies: You can manage the use of cookies and similar technologies through your browser settings. However, if you opt to disable or delete certain cookies, some features of our mobile application may not function properly. Access, Modify, or Delete Your Data: You can access, modify, or delete your personal data by logging into your account and updating your profile information. You can also contact us at cricketx@gmail.com to request access, modification, or deletion of your personal data. Data Portability: You can request a copy of your personal data in a commonly used electronic format so that you can manage and move it. Object or Restrict Processing: You can object to or restrict the processing of your personal data in certain circumstances, such as when we are using your data for direct marketing purposes. CHANGES TO THIS PRIVACY POLICY We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time in response to changing legal, technical, or business developments. When we update our Privacy Policy, we will take appropriate measures to inform you, consistent with the significance of the changes we make. We will obtain your consent to any material Privacy Policy changes if and where this is required by applicable data protection laws. You can see when this Privacy Policy was last updated by checking the "last updated" date displayed at the top of this Privacy Policy. CONTACT US If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at cricketx@gmail.com. We hope that we can satisfy queries you may have about the way we process your data. However, if you have unresolved concerns, you also have the right to complain to competent data protection authorities. GLOSSARY "Personal data" means any information relating to an identified or identifiable natural person. "Processing" means any operation or set of operations which is performed on personal data or on sets of personal data, whether or not by automated means, such as collection, recording, organization, structuring, storage, adaptation or alteration, retrieval, consultation, use, disclosure by transmission, dissemination or otherwise making available, alignment or combination, restriction, erasure, or destruction. "Controller" means the natural or legal person, public authority, agency, or other bodies which, alone or jointly with others, determines the purposes and means of the processing of personal data. "Processor" means a natural or legal person, public authority, agency, or other bodies which processes personal data on behalf of the controller. "Third-party" means a natural or legal person, public authority, agency, or body other than the data subject, controller, processor, and persons who, under the direct authority of the controller or processor, are authorized to process personal data.
